subject: Concussions
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets Manager Terry Collins suggested Wednesday that Jason Bay, whose average was the worst of any position player with 100 at-bats, might still be feeling the effects of two concussions.
snippet: Mets Manager Terry Collins suggested Wednesday that Jason Bay, whose average was the worst of any position player with 100 at-bats, might still be feeling the effects of two concussions.
